{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DIR-300 |revision=B1 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=04/28/2009 |manuf_country= |manuf=Alpha Networks |manuf_model=WRG-N23 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=KA2DIR300B1 |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1.2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3050 |cpu1_cspeed=320 |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320DBTI-70G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=ProMOS |ram1_model=V54C3256164VDI7 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3050 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware=DD-WRT |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} This device is on [http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Supported_Devices the DD-WRT Supported Devices table].
[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/d-link/dir-300revb Device page in OpenWRT wiki].
DIR-300 H/W rev. B1 hardware are same as in DIR-600 H/W Rev. B1
"8WRGN23..3A1G" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :This is the same board ID as the [[Keebox W150NR v1]].
